messages.msgSnippet: -=----I don t mind it the way it is. It says what it means.-=- The only problem is that when I (and maybe some others) start typing in UnschoolingDiscussion,
messages.messageBody:
-=----I don't mind it the way it is. It says what it means.-=-

The only problem is that when I (and maybe some others) start typing
in UnschoolingDiscussion, it comes up @googlegroups. And when it
comes in the mailbox it's hard to see which is which! That's not a
big problem, but it's a small problem.

Sandra
